title: website: stylesheet glitch with Firefox
body:
When viewing the golang.org website with Firefox 38 on Linux (Fedora 22) I see a grey background where there should be white. Loading the same page with Chrome on Linux displays white background.

The following screenshot shows Firefox on the left and Chrome on the right:
![go_screen](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1296987/7823916/5665bbf6-0442-11e5-9fe8-7041d8ae364b.png)

I checked the default background color in Firefox settings and that is set to white. I haven't noticed any other style glitches with other websites so far using Firefox 38.
